Sports Daily provides the latest scores and news from various sports events and leagues. Whether you are a fan of football, basketball, baseball, or any other sport, the app will keep you informed with live scores and news stories. You can also check out the weather with this extension. All score are provided courtesy of ESPN via: https://site.api.espn.com/apis/v2/scoreboard/header

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the Sports Daily extension and set the new tab search to that provided by the service. The search will be powered by Microsoft Bing.

Sports Daily features an interactive interface for easy navigation and quick access to important information. With Sports Daily , you'll never miss a beat and can stay up to date on all the action from your favorite sports.

Privacy Policy: https://openteamconsulting.com/privacy-ext
